description: This file defines the main layout component and setup for a Remix.js application frontend, including links, meta tags, and rendering outlet components.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external resources such as fonts and stylesheets to be included in the document head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main layout component that sets up the HTML structure with head elements and renders children components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component that renders the current route's outlet.
